languages.text: Астропатическое сообщение, полученное хором на флагмане фон Валанциус, взволновало Хейнрикса: что бы ни было предметом его беспокойства, он обратился к Вольному Торговцу за помощью, отдельно указав, что дело не терпит отлагательств.

A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.
languages.original_text: Астропатическое сообщение, полученное хором на флагмане фон Валанциус, взволновало Хейнрикса: что бы ни было предметом его беспокойства, он обратился к Вольному Торговцу за помощью, отдельно указав, что дело не терпит отлагательств.

traits.locale_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

languages.text: Un certain message, reçu par le chœur astropathique du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius, a déconcerté Heinrix. Quelle que soit la cause de son inquiétude soudaine, l'interrogateur a demandé l'aide {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, en affirmant que la situation exige une attention immédiate.
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

traits.locale_text: Un certain message, reçu par le chœur astropathique du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius, a déconcerté Heinrix. Quelle que soit la cause de son inquiétude soudaine, l'interrogateur a demandé l'aide {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, en affirmant que la situation exige une attention immédiate.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族期间的星语唱诗班突然收到了一条信息，这条信息让海因里希非常不安。虽然行商浪人并不清楚具体细节，但海因里希已经请求行商浪人的协助，并强调他打算立刻处理这件事情。
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族期间的星语唱诗班突然收到了一条信息，这条信息让海因里希非常不安。虽然行商浪人并不清楚具体细节，但海因里希已经请求行商浪人的协助，并强调他打算立刻处理这件事情。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦で感応通信聖歌隊が受け取ったあるメッセージによって、ハインリックスは狼狽した。突然の狼狽の原因が何であるかはさておき、インテロゲイターは自由開拓者に協力を要請し、この件には早急な対応が必要であると強調した。
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗艦で感応通信聖歌隊が受け取ったあるメッセージによって、ハインリックスは狼狽した。突然の狼狽の原因が何であるかはさておき、インテロゲイターは自由開拓者に協力を要請し、この件には早急な対応が必要であると強調した。

languages.text: Eine Nachricht des astropathischen Chors des Valancius-Flaggschiffs hat Heinrix beunruhigt. Was diese plötzliche Unruhe auch ausgelöst haben mag, der Interrogator hat um die Hilfe {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gebeten und betont, dass diese Angelegenheit {mf|dessen|deren} sofortige Aufmerksamkeit erfordere.
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

traits.locale_text: Eine Nachricht des astropathischen Chors des Valancius-Flaggschiffs hat Heinrix beunruhigt. Was diese plötzliche Unruhe auch ausgelöst haben mag, der Interrogator hat um die Hilfe {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gebeten und betont, dass diese Angelegenheit {mf|dessen|deren} sofortige Aufmerksamkeit erfordere.

languages.text: El Coro de Astrópatas de la nave insignia von Valancius ha recibido un mensaje que desconcierta a Heinrix. No está claro qué causa este repentino malestar, pero el Interrogador pide ayuda a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y recalca que el asunto exige atención inmediata.
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.

traits.locale_text: El Coro de Astrópatas de la nave insignia von Valancius ha recibido un mensaje que desconcierta a Heinrix. No está claro qué causa este repentino malestar, pero el Interrogador pide ayuda a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y recalca que el asunto exige atención inmediata.

languages.text: Von Valancius sancak gemisinin Astropatik Korosu'nun aldığı bir mesaj, Heinrix'in canını sıktı. Bu ani huzursuzluğa her ne sebep olduysa Sorgucu, Hür Tacir'in desteğini talep etti ve konunun acil müdahalesini gerektirdiğinin altını çizdi.
languages.original_text: A certain message received by the Astropathic Choir of the von Valancius flagship has disconcerted Heinrix. Whatever caused this sudden unease, the Interrogator has requested the Rogue Trader's assistance and stressed that the matter demands {mf|his|her} immediate attention.
